text: Shuanglian is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code of this station is R12. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Tamsui or Beitou and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan or Daan. == Around the station == * Chen Dexing Ancestral Hall * Immaculate Conception Cathedral * Ministry of Labor * Taiyuan Asian Puppet Theatre Museum * Mackay Commemorative Hospital * Taipei Rapid Transit Corporation Headquarters * Tatong District Main Office * Taipei Imperial Hotel * Minxiang Park * Taipei City Archives == References == Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Shuanglian metro station
